# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} l
# @return {Integer}
def number_of_alternating_groups(nums, l)
  nums += nums[0...l]
  x = nums.size





  
  cnt = 0
  p_d = [0] * (x + 1)
  
  (1...x).each do |i|
    p_d[i] = p_d[i - 1] + (nums[i] - nums[i - 1]).abs
  end
  
  l -= 1
  ((l + 1)...x).each do |i|
    cnt += 1 if p_d[i] - p_d[i - l] == l
  end
  
  cnt
end
